item.title: Need help with this ring
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:20, topic:462619”][code=java]

            if (deathStage == 1) {
            if (attacknpc > 0) {
            server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
            }
            ResetAttack();
            if(attacknpc == -1) {
            client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
            if(killerz.playerId != playerId) {

	if(killerz.lastKill == playerId) {
	killerz.sM("Repeating or false kill detected, you will not recieve any points or title.");
	return;
	}
			
            if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
            killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.");
            return;
            }
            if (killerz.playerEquipment[killerz.playerRing] == 2572) {
                    killerz.pkpoints += 5;
                    killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", with a donator ring, you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
                    } else if(killerz.playerEquipment[killerz.playerRing] != 2572) {
                    killerz.pkpoints += 1;
                    killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+",  you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
                    }
                }
            }
}

[/code]

Give that a shot, if you need additional help, pm me.[/quote]

100 errors…removed 1 close bracket from end and got 2 errors:

client.java:16346: error: missing return value
                return;
                ^
client.java:16351: error: missing return value
                return;
                ^
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need help with this ring
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

The whole point in killing someone on the same ip address is to not give them the pk points anyway isn’t it? The killstreak thing, you should just remove it for now, it’s really messy and it can be done better.

This works for me

                                if(c.inWild()){
                                if (o.playerEquipment[o.playerRing] == 2572) {
                                o.pkPoints += 5000;
                                o.sendMessage("You have received 5000 pk points");
                                return;
                                }
                                        o.pkPoints += 5;
                                        o.sendMessage("You have received 5 Pk Points");
                                }
}

item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Broken Britain, post:11, topic:462619”][code=java]
killerz.lastKill = playerId;

//donar ring
if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM(“Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){
killerz.pkpoints += 5;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, with a donator ring, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
} else {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
}
}
[/code]
Use that, there was an extra }.[/quote]

this compiles well but doesnt do anything…

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:12, topic:462619”]Hurts my eyes…

[code=java]
// If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
if(attacknpc == -1) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];

			if(killerz.playerId != playerId) {

if(killerz.lastKill == playerId) {
killerz.sM(“Repeating or false kill detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {
if(killerz.rampage == 0) {
killerz.rampage = 1;
} else if(killerz.rampage == 1) {
killerz.rampage = 2;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a DOUBLE KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage == 2) {
killerz.rampage = 3;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Triple KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage == 3) {
killerz.rampage = 4;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Quad KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 4) {
killerz.rampage = 5;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Streak of 5, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 5) {
killerz.rampage = 6;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 6, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 6) {
killerz.rampage = 7;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 7, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 7) {
killerz.rampage = 8;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 8, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 8) {
killerz.rampage = 9;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 9, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 9) {
killerz.rampage = 10;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 10, beware!");
}

if(rampage == 1) {
rampage = 0;
} else if(rampage == 2) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has slained “+playerName+” to dust!");
} else if(rampage == 3) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has slained “+playerName+” to dust!");
} else if(rampage >= 4) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has destroyed “+playerName+”, “+killerz.playerName+” is a hero!");
}

	if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
            killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.");
            return;
			}
            if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572) {
                    killerz.pkpoints += 5;
                    killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", with a donator ring, you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
                    } else if(playerEquipment[playerRing] != 2572) {
                    killerz.pkpoints += 1;
                    killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+",  you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
				}

//

			}
		}
	}
}

[/code][/quote]

} else if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){
        killerz.pkpoints += 5;
        killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", with a donator ring, you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
} else {
        killerz.pkpoints += 1;

item.title: Need help with this ring
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[code] // If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
}
ResetAttack();
if(attacknpc == -1) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];

if(killerz.playerId != playerId) {

if(killerz.lastKill == playerId) {
killerz.sM(“Repeating or false kill detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {
if(killerz.rampage == 0) {
killerz.rampage = 1;
} else if(killerz.rampage == 1) {
killerz.rampage = 2;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a DOUBLE KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage == 2) {
killerz.rampage = 3;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Triple KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage == 3) {
killerz.rampage = 4;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Quad KILL rampage!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 4) {
killerz.rampage = 5;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Streak of 5, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 5) {
killerz.rampage = 6;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 6, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 6) {
killerz.rampage = 7;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 7, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 7) {
killerz.rampage = 8;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 8, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 8) {
killerz.rampage = 9;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 9, beware!");
} else if(killerz.rampage >= 9) {
killerz.rampage = 10;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" is on a Killing Steak of 10, beware!");
}

if(rampage == 1) {
rampage = 0;
} else if(rampage == 2) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has slained “+playerName+” to dust!");
} else if(rampage == 3) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has slained “+playerName+” to dust!");
} else if(rampage >= 4) {
rampage = 0;
yell(""+killerz.playerName+" has destroyed “+playerName+”, “+killerz.playerName+” is a hero!");
}

if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM(“Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
return;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572) {
killerz.pkpoints += 5;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, with a donator ring, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
} else if(playerEquipment[playerRing] != 2572) {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
}
//

}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this ring

item.description:
@Broken_Britain wrote:

Change the blue else to else if.

killerz.lastKill = playerId;

//donar ring
if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
        killerz.sM("Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.");
} else if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){
        killerz.pkpoints += 5;
        killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+", with a donator ring, you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
} else {
        killerz.pkpoints += 1;
        killerz.sM("You have killed "+playerName+",  you now have "+killerz.pkpoints+" PvPP.");
}
}
}

item.title: Need help with this ring
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

so basically im trying to make a ring that give you 5 pkp when you get a kill vs the normal 1 point heres the code i added…

killerz.lastKill = playerId;

//donar ring
if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM(“Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {
if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){
killerz.pkpoints += 5;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, with a donator ring, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
} else {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
}
}
}

the blue stuff is what i added to the original code that gave 1 pkp…it compiles just fine but doesnt give me extra points when i get a kill wearing the ring. please help?
